section.title: Editing Virtual Machine or Template Properties
section.para: Edit the properties of a virtual machine or template to set parent and child virtual machines. SmartState Analysis also can detect this.

procedure.title: To Edit Virtual Machine or Template Properties

step.para: Click the accordion for the items to edit.
Click the item to edit properties.

Click
(Configuration), and then
(Edit this VM or Edit this Template) on the Taskbar.
From the Parent VM dropdown, select the parent virtual machine.
From Child VM selection, select virtual machines that are based on the current virtual machine from the list of Available VMs.
